  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105810</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Vaccination Question - Considering Facts and Opinions About the Human Papillomavirus Vaccine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schutzimpfung-Frage - Betrachten von von 
Tatsachen und von von Meinungen über den menschlichen Papillomavirus 
Impfstoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La question de vaccination - considérer des faits
et des avis au sujet du vaccin humain de Papillomavirus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pergunta do vaccination - considerando fatos e 
opiniões sobre a vacina humana de Papillomavirus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La domanda di vaccinazione - considerare i fatti e
le opinioni circa il vaccino umano di Papillomavirus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ερώτηση εμβολιασμού - που εξετάζει τα γεγονότα και 
τις Γνώμες για το ανθρώπινο εμβόλιο Papillomavirus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La pregunta de la vacunación - consideración de 
hechos y de opiniones sobre la vacuna humana de Papillomavirus</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students share opinions about common vaccines, then consider facts and opinions about the HPV vaccine and hold a "fishbowl" discussion. They then survey members of the community to determine their perspectives on the issue.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion teilen Kursteilnehmer Meinungen 
über geläufige Impfstoffe, dann betrachten Tatsachen und Meinungen 
über den HPV Impfstoff und halten eine "fishbowl" Diskussion an. 
Sie überblicken dann Bauteile der Gemeinschaft, um ihre 
Perspektiven auf der Ausgabe festzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants partagent des 
avis au sujet des vaccins communs, puis considèrent des faits et des 
avis au sujet du vaccin de HPV et tiennent une discussion de 
"fishbowl". Ils examinent alors des membres de la communauté 
pour déterminer leurs perspectives sur la question.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes compartilham de 
opiniões sobre vacinas comuns, a seguir consideram fatos e opiniões 
sobre a vacina de HPV e prendem uma discussão do "fishbowl". 
Examinam então membros da comunidade para determinar seus 
perspectives na edição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi ripartiscono le 
opinioni circa i vaccini comuni, quindi considerano i fatti e le 
opinioni circa il vaccino di HPV ed hanno una discussione "del 
fishbowl". Allora esaminano i membri della Comunità per 
determinare le loro prospettive sull'edizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι απόψεις μεριδίου σπουδαστών για
τα κοινά εμβόλια, εξετάζουν έπειτα τα γεγονότα και τις απόψεις 
για το εμβόλιο HPV και διοργανώνουν μια συζήτηση "fishbowl". 
Ερευνούν έπειτα τα μέλη της κοινότητας για να καθορίσουν 
τις προοπτικές τους στο ζήτημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes comparten 
opiniones sobre vacunas comunes, después consideran hechos y 
opiniones sobre la vacuna de HPV y llevan a cabo una discusión del 
"fishbowl". Entonces examinan a miembros de la comunidad para 
determinar sus perspectivas en la edición.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
